column3: Dissatisfied with the name “<Highlight>StringParameter(1)</Highlight>”? I understand. Pray allow me to review your registration...
A fee of 2,000 gil is required for each name change.
Change your race chocobo's name to <Clickable(StringParameter(1))/> for <Format(IntegerParameter(2),FF022C)/> gil?
Excellent choice, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>madam<Else/>sir</If>. I think all here would agree that <Highlight>StringParameter(1)</Highlight> is a far better name.
Dissatisfied with your race chocobo's name? I understand. Pray allow me to review your registration...
Beg your pardon, but did I misunderstand your request? I can find no record of a race chocobo currently registered to you...
You can only change the name of a registered race chocobo.
I do not wish to embarrass you, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>madam<Else/>sir</If>, but it seems you lack the requisite gil...
Ah... Forgive me, but it seems that the name you requested is... How shall I put this? Ineligible.
The word combination you selected is prohibited. Please select a different name.
Then you wish to retain your race chocobo's current name, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>madam<Else/>sir</If>? Very well.
